ProjectTitle: mERCATOR: Engineering Regenerative CAllus-Tissue ORganoids for compromised long bone defects
InitialFeedbackHistory:
07/07/2023
Data: Under ethics you indicate dual use, please note that this refers to research data with a risk of use for unethical or military purposes, is this the case in your project or do you mean that you use both human and animal data? In that case check these 2 boxes instead. You now mention an ML number, normally UZL approvals start with an S, do you have an S number? You also list some older numbers from the animal ethics committee, these are normally valid for max 5 years, please update this section with valid ethical approval numbers. For more information see https://research.kuleuven.be/en/associatienet/ethics/index
Sharing: You can also consider using a repository for preservation and sharing, eg EBI (www.ebi.ac.uk) or KU Leuven RDR (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr) where you can also apply access restrictions if needed, this makes is easier for others to find your data and you will get a DOI that makes you data citable, for more information see for more information see www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr and www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
label: good with suggestions
